name: DA Peow Peow
description:
DA Phew Phew Game is a first person shooter game with two game modes:
  •  Team vs Team

You and your teammates have to kill more than the other team, and you have 5 minutes

  • Free For All

You have to kill the most in 5 minutes to win.

You can play each mode as an online multiplayer game with you friends or you can play against bots.
